CustomField.formula: IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >4.5,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_5_stars_T.png", "5", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >4,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_4_and_a_half_stars_T.png", "4.5", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >3.5,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_4_stars_T.png", "4", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >3,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_3_and_a_half_stars_T.png", "3.5", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >2.5,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_3_stars_T.png", "3", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >2,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_2_and_a_half_stars_T.png", "2.5", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >1.5,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_2_stars_T.png", "2", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >1,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_1_and_a_half_stars_T.png", "1.5", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >0.5,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_1_star_T.png", "1", 15, 120), IF(Moyenne_des_scores__c >0,IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_0_and_half_star_T.png", "0.5", 15, 120), IMAGE("/resource/Stars/5_Star_Rating_System_0_stars_T.png", "0", 15, 120)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Note attribu√©e
